data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Broad Swings
data.description: All of your attacks for the next 10 seconds will strike up to 2 additional enemies within 25 feet in front of you.

data.name: Brush Off
data.description: Gain a 300 tactic bonus to agility.

data.name: Brute Force
data.description: Grants a 160 unique bonus to strength

data.name: Charge!
data.description: You charge into the thick of battle, increasing your run speed by 50% for 7 seconds. If you use any abilities, this effect will immediately end.

data.name: Concussive Jolt
data.description: A great wave of concussive force knocks down all targets 25 feet in front of you for 3 seconds, inflicting X physical damage.

data.name: Confusing Movements
data.description: Concentrating on your perceived movements, you will be able to dodge and parry all attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Convulsive Slashing
data.description: You continually slice at an enemy for up to 3 seconds, striking them up to 7 times and dealing X phyical damage per hit. Up to 1 strike every second will remove a blessing or enchantment from the target and deal and additional Y damage. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Corruption
data.description: Target takes a (rank * 3) ability penalty to toughness, weapon skill, and willpower for 10 seconds. You will take Y corporeal damage.

data.name: Crushing Blows
data.description: Whenever you critically hit an enemy, they will lose 15 morale per second for 5 seconds.

data.name: Cutting Claw
data.description: Target takes a (rank * 40) ability penalty to armor for 15 seconds. You will take X corporeal damage.

data.name: Deadly Clutch
data.description: Corruption will now reduce all healing used on the victim by 50%.

data.name: Debilitate
data.description: A deliberate attack that inflicts X phyical damage and cripples your target, reducing their movement speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

data.name: Deeply Impaled
data.description: Any time you Impale an enemy, they will become 10% more susceptible to being critically hit for 10 seconds.

data.name: Demolition
data.description: A widespread attack that inflicts X physical damage to up to 3 targets up to 25 feet in front of you. You will take Y corporeal damage.

data.name: Energy Ripple
data.description: A large burst of power courses through you, dealing 1200 damage to all targets within 30 feet, knocking down all targets around you for 3 seconds.

data.name: Exhaustive Strikes
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, their action point cost will be increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Feeding On Fear
data.description: Your chance to critically hit is increased by 20%, but you are also 10% more susceptible to being critically hit.

data.name: Ferocious Assault
data.description: Chaotic winds and daemonic fury combine for 20 seconds. You gain a (Rank * 10) ability bonus to strength.

data.name: Flail
data.description: Swipes opponent for X physical damage and Y corporeal damage. You will take Y corporeal damage.

data.name: Flames of Fate
data.description: Your target is engulfed in the chaotic flames of fate, dealing 300 damage and roots them in place for 10 seconds.

data.name: Flanking
data.description: All of your attacks deal 30% more damage when you strike an enemy from the sides or rear. You lose 10% parry strikethrough.

data.name: Rush
data.description: Gain 25% increased movement speed for 5 seconds. The duration is increased by 1 second for every 50 action points you had. You become exerted losing all of your action points, career mechanic points, and morale. Your AP recovery and morale per second are set to 0 for the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Force of Will
data.description: You stare down your opponent, draining 200 of their action aoints into yourself, and causing them to take a 160 morale penalty to strength for 30 seconds.

data.name: Forked Aggression
data.description: For 20 seconds, all damage dealt to you is mirrored back to the attacker with a 50% boost.

data.name: Frenzied Slaughter
data.description: All of your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points, cool down 50% faster, and deal 20% more damage for 7 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Brutality
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Brutality, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a brutal blade.

While mutated, you gain (rank * 1)% damage and take a 450 morale penalty to corporeal resistance.

data.name: Gift of Monstrosity
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Monstrosity, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a vicious club.

While mutated, you will lose 10 action points per second, gain a (rank * 3) morale bonus to toughness, and gain 3% health per second. This gift will end if you run out of action points.

data.name: Gift of Release
data.description: Releases your current mutation.

data.name: Gift of Savagery
data.description:
You are imbued with the Gift of Savagery, warping and twisting the flesh of your arm into a savage claw.

While mutated, your auto attacks will swing (rank *3)% faster and everytime you strike an enemy you will gain 5 action points.

data.name: Great Fang
data.description: A cleaving attack that inflicts 448 physical damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you and causes them to take a 180 morale penalty to wounds for 10s

data.name: Guillotine
data.description: A powerful blow inflicting X physical damage. If the target is above 40% health, you will take 3X corporeal damage.

data.name: Hulking Brute
data.description: You gain a tactic bonus to weaponskill and willpower equal to 30% of your wounds.

data.name: Impale
data.description: Stabs into your opponents vital areas for X physical damage. You will take Y corporeal damage unless you are behind the target.

data.name: Insane Whispers
data.description: You will remove 1 curse, ailment, or curse from you every 5 seconds. You have -50% critical damage.

data.name: Jagged Edge
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy they will begin to bleed, suffering additional X corporeal damage over 6 seconds. If you are critically hit, you will suffer the same damage. These effects do not refresh.

data.name: Lashing Power
data.description: For 20 seconds, each time you are hit, there is a 33% chance that the same amount of damage will be done to an enemy within 40 feet, and you will be healed for that amount.

data.name: Mutated Energy
data.description: Disrupted Magic is twisted back into the caster, inflicting X corporeal damage. The target is disarmed and silenced for 5 seconds unable to act. If the disable is not defended, you will gain 25% melee critical cahcne for 10 seconds.

data.name: Mutating Release
data.description: Your bones and muscles twist and contort to free you from any root or snaring effects. You will also be immune from all snares and roots for the next 10 seconds

data.name: Piercing Bite
data.description: Touch of Chaos now has a 30s duration and will last for 3 hits. Mutated Energy no longer requires a parry, dodge, or disrupt in order to be cast.

data.name: Plunder
data.description: You link yourself to target stealing 20% of their critical damage. This costs 20 action points per second and will break if you run out of action points. This ability does not trigger the global cooldown.

data.name: Improved Mutations
data.description: Gift of Brutality no longer gives a morale penalty to corporeal resistance. Gift of Monstrosity no longer costs action points per second. Gift of Savagery will now reduce the action point cost of abilities by 25%.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description: A prolonged fervor that grants 10 action points a second to everyone in your group within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rend
data.note: Requires Gift of Savagery or Brutality
data.description: You tear into your target, dealing X physical damage over 12 seconds. This effect can stack up to three times and will tick once per second. You take Y corporeal damage.

data.name: Rend Asunder
data.description: Rend now does 3.5X physical damage over 12 seconds with a 3s tick interval. It no longer stacks up to 3 and cannot be dispelled.

data.name: Riposte
data.description: Each time you parry an enemy's attack, you will strike them back for X physical damage which they can not prevent.

data.name: Sever Nerve
data.description: A directed strike that inflicts 1200 damage to your target.

data.name: Subvert Strength
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, you will regain 40 action points. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Tainted Claws
data.description: While this skill is active, whenever you deal damage to yourself you will deal X corporeal damage to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of you. Rend will apply to up to 8 other enemies within 30 feet of the primary target. Corruption will deal Y corporeal damage to the target and caster at the end of its effect. This skill costs 5 action points per second and will end if you run out of action points.

data.name: Terrible Embrace
data.description: Extends a tendril of energy to pull an opposing player towards you. Monster targets will be dragged to the ground. This skill is channeled and will go on cooldown if interrupted.

data.name: Throw Axe
data.description: Throwing axe that will deal X phyical damage to your prey. You gain 15 action points.

data.name: Thunderous Blow
data.description: A particularly nasty blow that causes the target to take a (rank * 10) ability penalty to wounds for 15 seconds.

data.name: Touch of Chaos
data.description:
With Gift of Savagery, spreads an agonizing rot to your opponent for 10 seconds, inflicting X corporeal damage whenever they use an ability.

This effect will be removed if the target is attacked.

data.name: Tzeentch's Reversal
data.description: Melee attack that deals 1200 damage and returns all of that damage as health.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your elemental resistance by 300. Grants a 169 unique bonus to corporeal and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Unending Horror
data.description: Increases Wave Of Horror's duration to 15 seconds.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Wave of Horror
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet are detaunted, making them hate you less and reducing the damage they deal against you to 50% for 5 seconds. If you attack anyone you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Wave of Mutilation
data.description: A wave of horror spreads forth from youto up to 9 enemies within 30 feet. Targets will take a (rank * 3) ability penalty to initiative and agility for 10s. After 8s, they will spread this effect to up to 9 enemies within 30 feet of them. This effect does not refresh or stack.

data.name: Widespread Demolition
data.description: Increased Demolition's radius to 30 feet and it now hits up to 9 enemies.

data.name: Wrecking Ball
data.description: You spin in a circle with club arm extended, aimlessly inflicting X physical damage every second to up to 9 targets within 30 feet in front of you for up to 3 seconds. This effect will end if you break your concentration or run out of action points.
